name: CurrentWorkflowSettings
description: Represents the last settings representation that have been used for a specific client

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the SCIM Resource as defined by the Service Provider.

attributes.name: openIdClientId
attributes.description: The foreign key reference to an open-id-client resource.

attributes.name: dpop
attributes.description: If the AccessToken should be bound to a DPoP token (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc9449).

subAttributes.name: useDpop
subAttributes.description: If a DPoP should be send in the access-token request or not.

subAttributes.name: keyId
subAttributes.description: The ID of the key the DPoP should reference.

subAttributes.name: signatureAlgorithm
subAttributes.description: The algorithm to sign the DPoP JWT.

subAttributes.name: nonce
subAttributes.description: The expected nonce of the remote system that must be added to the DPoP.

subAttributes.name: jti
subAttributes.description: Optional value to use as 'jti'. Will be auto-generated if left empty.

subAttributes.name: htm
subAttributes.description: The value of the HTTP method (Section 9.1 of [RFC9110]) of the request to which the JWT is attached.

subAttributes.name: htu
subAttributes.description: The HTTP target URI (Section 7.1 of [RFC9110]) of the request to which the JWT is attached, without query and fragment parts.

subAttributes.name: ath
subAttributes.description: Hash of the access token. The value MUST be the result of a base64url encoding (as defined in Section 2 of [RFC7515]) the SHA-256 [SHS] hash of the ASCII encoding of the associated access token's value.

attributes.name: authCodeParameters
attributes.description: The settings that have been used for the authorization code grant in the last request.

subAttributes.name: redirectUri
subAttributes.description: The redirect URI that was entered into the frontend input field.

subAttributes.name: queryParameters
subAttributes.description: A string representation of query parameters that should be appended to the authorization request

attributes.name: clientCredentialsParameters
attributes.description: The settings that have been used for the client credentials grant in the last request.

subAttributes.name: scope
subAttributes.description: The optional scope parameter to set the scope of the access token.

attributes.name: resourceOwnerPasswordParameters
attributes.description: The settings that have been used for the resource owner password credentials grant in the last request.

subAttributes.name: username
subAttributes.description: The username that should be used to authenticate at the identity provider.

subAttributes.name: password
subAttributes.description: The password that should be used to authenticate at the identity provider with the given username.

subAttributes.name: scope
subAttributes.description: The optional scope parameter to set the scope of the access token.
